name: pollsia
description: Sistema automatizado de gestÃ£o e otimizaÃ§Ã£o de pools de liquidez na blockchain Solana

scripts.start: echo 'ğŸš€ Iniciando PollsIA...' && docker-compose up -d && echo 'âœ… Acesse: http://localhost:3000'
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.typecheck: cd backend && npm run typecheck && cd ../frontend && npm run typecheck
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.test:coverage: cd backend && npm run test:coverage && cd ../frontend && npm run test:coverage
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build:all && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.check:all: echo 'ğŸ§ª Executando todos os testes...' && npm run test:all && echo 'ğŸ” Verificando lint...' && npm run lint && echo 'ğŸ“ Verificando tipos...' && npm run typecheck && echo 'âœ… TUDO OK! Pronto para commit.'
